description: Raised when some sort of data validation fails
Raised When some sort of type mismatch occurs
Raised When some specific format is expected, and that is not fulfilled.
Raised When some field/data is expected, but not got.
Raised When some field/data is empty/void, but it is required to have some value
Raised When some field/data is expected to in form of a real number, but it is actually not
Raised When some field/data is expected to in form of a positive number, but it is actually not
